requirements.summary: Publish the current deployed draft version of the SurgiPaw app to production
acceptanceCriteria: The current draft version is promoted to the live/published production environment.
The published version reflects all previously deployed changes.

file_operations.description: Update the PWA manifest to reflect production settings, ensuring the app name, description, and URLs are finalized for the published version.
Update the service worker cache version identifier to ensure users receive the latest production build and old draft caches are invalidated.
Verify and update meta tags (title, description, theme-color) to reflect the production environment and ensure PWA manifest link is correct.
Review and ensure production-ready configuration for QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, confirming no development-only settings remain.
